title: update-mockgen script is oudated
body:
<!--💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎

Hellooo! 😄 

To help us tend to your issue faster, please search our currently open issues before submitting a new one.
Existing issues often contain information about workarounds, resolution, or progress updates.

💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎-->

# 🐞 Bug Report

### Description
The mockgen script is not pointing to the right files. (i.e. `proto/beacon/rpc/v1/services.proto` does not exist anymore, should now point to `github.com/prysmaticlabs/ethereumapis/eth/v1alpha1/...`).

## 🔬 Minimal Reproduction
Run:
> ./scripts/update-mockgen.sh


## 🔥 Error
```
generating ./beacon-chain/internal/validator_service_mock.go for interfaces: ValidatorServiceServer,ValidatorService_WaitForActivationServer,ValidatorService_WaitForChainStartServer
build command-line-arguments: cannot load github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1: module github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm@latest found (v0.3.10), but does not contain package github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1
build command-line-arguments: cannot load github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1: module github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm@latest found (v0.3.10), but does not contain package github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1

2020/05/11 23:52:56 Loading input failed: exit status 1
generating ./validator/internal/attester_service_mock.go for interfaces: AttesterServiceClient

2020/05/11 23:52:57 Loading input failed: exit status 1

build command-line-arguments: cannot load github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1: module github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm@latest found (v0.3.10), but does not contain package github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1
```

Hello @michaelhly ! Thanks for reporting an issue. @rauljordan do you know what kind of changes need to be made to this script?
